t: Amazon.com: FENCE SHOCK 48Inch Step-in Fence Post-Electric Fence ...
s: This is the third brand of step-in post and so far my favorite. I've ordered others that were too stiff and after cold weather easily snapped and broke. These have enough flexibility in them to be more weatherproof, but not so flexible that they lose their shape. And the clips are easy but keep the polywire in place. I can actually do the step-in and wire with these without an extra person! ... Perfect for temporary fencing ...
